review.title: “A Comfortable Front Office”
review.pros: Pros – It was a very friendly and supportive atmosphere. People tend to be wiling to work outside of job descriptions when necessary.
review.cons: Cons – Generally, the the company's organization could use a little tidying and some changes in policy take a while to get off the ground.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Management should continue what they've been doing and pursue avenues that promote excellent growth opportunities for all of their office employees.
